entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Rain changing to light snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
